episodes.name: The Mayor of Kingstown
episodes.overview: Brothers Mitch and Mike McLusky navigate Kingstown, home to multiple prisons, as they act as the liaisons between prisoners and the community. When a young guard, Sam, is set up to deliver a letter for a prisoner, Mike works to get him off the hook.

episodes.name: The End Begins
episodes.overview: Local gang leader, Bunny is upset when one of his guys gets taken off the yard. Mike brokers a deal, and is later visited by two FBI agents whom Mitch worked for. Milo has instructions for Josef on how to get closer to Mike.

episodes.name: Simply Murder
episodes.overview: After a tragic accident has deadly consequences, an all-out manhunt ensues. Meanwhile, Mike reaches out to a former prison contact.

episodes.name: The Price
episodes.overview: Everyone wants something from Mike, who reminds them who is in control. Iris visits Mike's office. Mariam and Mike discuss Kyle's future.

episodes.name: Orion
episodes.overview: Kyle and Ian are questioned by internal affairs in the wake of the shootout. Bunny asks Mike for help with a close family member.

episodes.name: Every Feather
episodes.overview: When a fight breaks out on the yard, Sam finds himself in trouble again. Milo goes to extreme lengths to get what he wants. Mike sends a message.

episodes.name: Along Came a Spider
episodes.overview: Mike pays Milo a visit, looking for answers. Tensions at the men's prison reach a boiling point. Mike makes a disturbing discovery.

episodes.name: The Devil is Us
episodes.overview: Kyle and Kingstown PD try to make sense of the crime scene. Mike takes matters into his own hands. Sam makes a costly mistake.

episodes.name: The Lie of the Truth
episodes.overview: Tracy has good news for Kyle. Mike and Iris spend a peaceful day at the cabin, unaware of the trouble escalating back in town.

episodes.name: This Piece of My Soul
episodes.overview: Kingstown Prison descends into total chaos. Mike desperately works to help stop a riot that will have serious consequences for all involved.

episodes.name: Never Missed a Pigeon
episodes.overview: In the wake of the Kingstown Prison riot, violence and chaos ensue in the newly formed tent city. Mike and Bunny discuss what must be done to solve the leadership void on the inside. Kyle begins his new job with the Michigan State Police.

episodes.name: Staring at the Devil
episodes.overview: After a power vacuum in tent city spills out into Kingstown, Mike makes a bold move to try and restore order. Iris is uneasy about her new living arrangement. Kyle finds himself in a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Five at Five
episodes.overview: Mike asks for help in finding Iris, and later takes matters into his own hands. A move by Robert and his team puts Mike's larger plan in jeopardy. Kyle has a request for Kingstown PD.

episodes.name: The Pool
episodes.overview: Mike increases pressure on Evelyn to honor her side of the deal before another unexpected event at tent city. Bunny worries Mike has lost control. Mariam attempts an act of good will.

episodes.name: Kill Box
episodes.overview: In the wake of the tent city transfer, Mike finds himself in a race to locate Bunny. Kareem surveys the new power structure, and later gets some unsettling news. Kyle contemplates his next move. Milo looks to fix Joseph's mistake.

episodes.name: Left With the Nose
episodes.overview: Mike leverages a favor with the new powers in charge. Bunny finds himself short on patience as Anchor Bay becomes increasingly volatile. Kyle and Mike have a heart to heart. Robert gets some troubling news.

episodes.name: Drones
episodes.overview: Robert, Kyle, and Ian look to get their story straight as the internal affairs investigation looms. In the wake of Lockett's murder, Mike and Evelyn's relationship grows tense. Mike takes care of a problem for Bunny. Tracy worries about Kyle.

episodes.name: Santa Jesus
episodes.overview: Mike spends his version of a day off the grid. Ian goes to great lengths to solve a problem. Bunny has a gift for Raphael. Milo speaks to Iris alone.

episodes.name: Peace in the Valley
episodes.overview: Mike and Milo discuss a possible trade. Bunny makes a brazen move and later has a demand for Mike. Mariam looks to track down Jacob. Evelyn is livid with Mike.

episodes.name: Little Green Ant
episodes.overview: It's all hands on deck as the war spills out into the streets of Kingstown. A mistake has serious repercussions. The trust between Mike and Bunny reaches a moment of truth. Iris finds herself with nowhere else to go.

episodes.name: Soldier's Heart
episodes.overview: Tensions are high as tragedy strikes in Kingstown. Meanwhile, a new face of the Russian mob sets up shop in the city.

episodes.name: Guts
episodes.overview: Anchor Bay gets a new inmate as Mike investigates recent deaths both inside and outside of prison walls.

episodes.name: Barbarians at the Gate
episodes.overview: The Mayor makes his presence known to Konstantin. Bunny brings Mike up to speed on a failed assassination attempt.

episodes.name: Rag Doll
episodes.overview: Desperate to confirm the source of a spate of bombings, Mike extends an unlikely olive branch.

episodes.name: Iris
episodes.overview: Danger erupts when Iris confronts her past. The Mayor finds a new chess piece as Bunny and Konstantin's rivalry reaches new heights.

episodes.name: Ecotone
episodes.overview: After an attack hits close to home, Mike is given an ultimatum that could change everything.

episodes.name: Marya Was Here
episodes.overview: An incident on the bridge raises questions across Kingstown. Mike sets a risky plan in motion.

episodes.name: Captain of the Sh*t out of Luck
episodes.overview: Anchor Bay is attacked from outside its prison walls. Mike takes care of some important business at Kingstown Women's Prison.

episodes.name: Home on the Range
episodes.overview: Unfinished business haunts Kingstown as the Crips seek revenge at the hospital.

episodes.name: Comeuppance
episodes.overview: Mike's plan for the warring factions in Kingstown hits turbulence.

episodes.name: Coming 'Round the Mountain
episodes.overview: Mike works every angle to protect his brother while contending with new forces in Kingstown; Kyle accepts his fate, Evelyn sets her sights on Ian and Bunny allows himself to imagine a different future.

episodes.name: Promises to Keep
episodes.overview: Mike sends the prison a message and considers an offer from a Detroit legend. Kyle adjusts to his new reality.

episodes.name: People Who Died
episodes.overview: Mike and Ian discover a coverup that leads to an unexpected source. Moses shows Bunny the ropes, Kyle wrestles with his newfound futility and as the cartel threat grows, Mike enlists help to snuff it out at its source.

episodes.name: Sins of Omission
episodes.overview: Confronted with the cartel's unexpected strength, Mike's orders weave their way through the prison. Evelyn's continued probe puts her in danger. Mike grows closer to a new C.O. while putting an old friend on notice.

episodes.name: Damned
episodes.overview: New dangers threaten Mike's family as Callahan comes back into focus. Mike goes toe-to-toe with Hobbs as Ian goes to great lengths to sabotage Evelyn's case against him.
The cartel war reaches new heights when a deadly attack reverberates through town. Mike makes a bargain with the devil to save his brother.

episodes.name: My Way
episodes.overview: Mike hatches a plan to grant Kyle's freedom, saddling Ian with an agonizing task. Moses makes a play that sparks consequences for cartel leadership.

episodes.name: Belleville
episodes.overview: Mike lays a dangerous trap while a prison break puts the town in peril. Hobbs extends an olive branch to Mike.

episodes.name: Teeth and Tissue
episodes.overview: After tragedy strikes close to home, Mike risks everything to save his brother. Inside the prison, tensions reach a breaking point, and an active threat forces Cindy's hand.

episodes.name: Belly of the Beast
episodes.overview: Mike fights to prevent Kyle from following in his footsteps and confronts the demons of his past. Hobbs makes a crucial decision as Bunny gains a new advantage.
